data.prayer: Father, move the 5,007 believers in the state of Guánica to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Guánica, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Guánica, Puerto Rico with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.section_summary: On average, 7 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next month in Guánica, Puerto Rico.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, help the 5,007 believers in Guánica to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Guánica, Puerto Rico to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Guánica.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Guánica, Puerto Rico to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Guánica, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.section_summary:
the state of Guánica, Puerto Rico has a population of 15,400.

We estimate Guánica has 5,007 people who might know Jesus, 9,553 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 840 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.
